job_purpose: Developing custom web applications for the timber and building supplies industry with a focus on Shopify development and automation tools.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Analyzing current systems to determine program needs and identify deficiencies
System testing to diagnose errors and ensure seamless operations
Writing and maintaining program code using Node.js, Remix framework, and Liquid code
Engineering and implementing advanced timber calculators and estimation tools
Collaborating with cross-functional teams for API integration and software design activities
Creating technical solutions based on business requirements
required_qualifications: Bachelor level qualification in Information Technology, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field
Strong technical competency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and Node.js
Proven experience with Shopify Liquid code and Remix framework
Practical knowledge of e-commerce platforms, especially Shopify and BigCommerce
Exceptional problem-solving skills with attention to detail
Understanding of timber products and building materials
company_name: Canterbury Timber & Building Supplies Pty Ltd
company_details: Australian company and Timber and Building Supplier, servicing construction, building, carpentry and handyman trade clients and DIY customers, supplying a range of more than 28,000 timber, hardware and building materials products, sourced from all major Australian suppliers.
